scripts.test: if [ -d "test" ]; then yarn run warn; else yarn run test:ts; fi;
scripts.coverage: if [ -d "test" ]; then yarn run warn; else yarn run coverage:ts; fi;
scripts.warn:
echo "Refusing to overwrite 'test' directory. Run '\033[1;33myarn run clean\033[0m'.
"
scripts.test:ts: trap "yarn run clean" INT TERM; (yarn run bindings:ts && tsc && truffle test) && yarn run clean
scripts.coverage:ts: trap "yarn run clean" INT TERM; (yarn run bindings:ts && tsc && solidity-coverage) && yarn run clean
scripts.bindings:go: solc --allow-paths . --combined-json bin,abi,userdoc,devdoc,metadata contracts/**/*.sol | abigen -pkg bindings --out bindings.go --abi -
scripts.deployToKovan: truffle migrate --skipDryRun --network kovan && yarn run merge .merged/kovan
scripts.deployToMainnet: truffle migrate --skipDryRun --network mainnet && yarn run merge .merged/mainnet
